text: The Clueless CD-ROM is a promotional product based on the Clueless film and television series released by Mattel Media in 1997 for Microsoft Windows and Macintosh. The CD-ROM is intended for girls age 8 and up, and includes a soundtrack, trivia, makeover and dress-up activities, and six video games.https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cmstudies.org/resource/resmgr/In_Focus_Archive/53-3_IF.pdf == References == ==External links== * https://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/clueless-cd-rom Category:1997 video games Category:Educational video games Category:Mac OS games Category:Video games based on films Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: Clueless CD-ROM
